data.text: @vintage_vendor @ShantelMarnie Different day. Only difference HE is much nicer and more polite than I am. We go to court different days. I'm going slightly faster than he was. Yet my fine was 25.00 less. He had no prior tickets. I had 2! What other explanation is there? No. I would think hard before calling.

@vintage_vendor @ShantelMarnie I'm a middle aged white woman.I'll tell you straight. Most of us have no idea what it is like to be judged by the color of our skin. Most of us are called ma'am by police. Same exact police stops my husband (who is brown) he gets slammed on the hood ,same offense as me (speeding)
@ShantelMarnie Sigh. I'm getting damn sick of women (likely middle aged and probably white) acting like police wannabes. Second story just today.
